text: Boerlagella is a genus of flowering plants first described as a genus in 1890.Pierre, Jean Baptiste Louis. 1890. Notes Botaniques Sapotacées 1: 33Cogniaux, Célestin Alfred. 1891. Monographiae Phanerogamarum 7: 1173 in FrenchTropicos, Boerlagella Cogn. The genus contains only one known species, Boerlagella spectabilis, endemic to the Island of Sumatra in Indonesia. ==References== Category:Sapotoideae Category:Monotypic Ericales genera Category:Flora of Sumatra Category:Sapotaceae genera
title: Boerlagella
